themes: Need for funding outside downtown/tourist areas
Challenges for local, non-tourist businesses accessing grants
Desire to better compensate local artists
Perceived limitations of current grant programs
key_phrases: Money for local venues that are not downtown or tourist-centered
current grants are a nice start
as a small business owner with a local business that doesn’t just cater to tourists
harder to get city money to help better pay the great local artists we get at our shop
barriers_identified: Difficulty for non-tourist-centered, local businesses to access city funding
Current grants are insufficient for supporting local venues and artists outside downtown
solutions_proposed: Increase funding for local venues that are not downtown or tourist-centered
Provide more support to help local businesses pay local artists better
